name: Alex Pang
content: UC Santa Cruz - Computer Science Department Mailing information: Alex Pang Professor, Computer Science Department University of California Santa Cruz, CA 95064 Contact information: phone: (831) 459-2712 fax: (831) 459-4829 email: pang@cse.ucsc.edu Research interests: tensor visualization scientific visualization collaboration software for visualization uncertainty visualization virtual reality interfaces "The key to terascale visualization is deciding what not to visualize."
